channel.title: Mysql problem(help please)
channel.description:
Ok i wanna make a server use mysql database basically instead of the .txt file method, i know how to make a table and shit like that i just want my server to load the chars, banned users, and ip banned users from the database, so yeah if you can help me or tell me where to go that would be really great. i have worked with mysql b4 on ms and wow p servers so if you dont know what iam talking about dont even reply. please and thank you. ~xxx123xxx
